pr_title: SAK-43112 Recover rubrics with softly deleted assignments

timeline.bodyText: feel like we don't need to softly delete a rubric association at all?
timeline.author: ern

replies.bodyText: This is done to unlock the rubric and allow removing it, keeping consistency with the approach taken on #7749
replies.author: bgarciaentornos

timeline.message:
SAK-43112 Recover rubrics with softly deleted assignments

NOTE: The order of the deleteRubricAssociationParameters method was
wrong in the service declaration.

SAK-43112 Recover rubrics with softly deleted assignments

NOTE: The order of the deleteRubricAssociationParameters method was
wrong in the service declaration.
